name: Dandelli
column7: I had the opportunity to visit Dandelli
column8: a beautiful place with a serene atmosphere. The place is known for its natural beauty and serene environment

name: Murdeshwar
description: "Murdeshwar is a beautiful place with a serene atmosphere. The place is known for the main attraction - Shri Mahabaleshwar Temple. The temple is known for its architecture and the gorgeous statue of Lord Shiva."

column7: the beautiful and calm backwaters of Honnavar were a peaceful pause to the trip."
